section.title: About me
about.summary: I am √Ålvaro, a software developer passionate about creating innovative and efficient solutions. I am always looking to learn and grow in my career, facing new challenges with enthusiasm and dedication.
about.initiation: I started in the world of programming at 13 years old, programming video games in Unity with C#. Since then, I have explored multiple languages and technologies, developing a solid foundation in application and web development.
about.current-occupation: Currently, I work as a freelance developer, collaborating with clients to create customized solutions that meet their specific needs. Additionally, I dedicate time to personal projects that allow me to experiment with new technologies and improve my skills.
